services.title: Personal Horoscope
services.description: Get comprehensive insights into your life through detailed Vedic birth chart analysis. Understand your strengths, challenges, and destiny path.

services.title: Marriage Matching
services.description: Traditional Kundali Milan service for marriage compatibility analysis. Comprehensive matching of Guna, Mangal Dosha, and planetary positions.

services.title: Career Guidance
services.description: Discover your ideal career path based on planetary positions and dashas. Get timing for job changes and business ventures.

services.title: Vastu Consultation
services.description: Expert Vastu Shastra consultation for homes and offices. Balance energies and create prosperity through proper spatial arrangement.

services.title: Gemstone Recommendation
services.description: Personalized gemstone recommendations based on your birth chart. Enhance positive energies and mitigate negative influences.

services.title: Yearly Prediction
services.description: Comprehensive yearly horoscope with monthly predictions. Plan your year with insights into health, wealth, and relationships.

updates.title: Diwali Special Offer
updates.body: Get 20% off on all yearly consultation packages. Limited time offer valid until Diwali.

updates.title: New Moon Meditation Session
updates.body: Join our special New Moon meditation and intention-setting session. Free for existing clients.

updates.title: Workshop: Understanding Your Birth Chart
updates.body: Learn to read basic elements of your Vedic birth chart. 3-hour workshop with live Q&A.
